ModMetaData.name: No Firewatcher
ModMetaData.author: Why_is_that
ModMetaData.description:
[h1][b]Features:[/b][/h1] - Removes the firewatcher which sends rain when fires get too out of control - Includes performance changes to fire mechanics (makes the game run faster/smoother) - Rain amount now affects the amount of damage done to fire (only takes place with custom weather)
[h1][b]Note:[/b][/h1] If using this mod there is no need to use `Improved Fire Performance`. This mod provides greater performance as the firewatcher also consumes time (and IFP does not remove the firewatcher). However, feel free to use both -- I detect this and it will cause no errors.
[h1][b]Related Fire Mods:[/b][/h1] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1086832792]Firestarter[/url] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1133660029]Improved Fire Performance[/url]
[h1][b]Source:[/b][/h1] [url=https://github.com/AaronCRobinson/NoFirewatcher]Github[/url]
[h1][b]Acknowledgements:[/b][/h1] Special thanks to Pardeike's amazing non-destructive patching library, Harmony.
